eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
&&\!\!\!\!- \alpha^{\prime} - (A + C) \left( n - \frac{1}{2} \right) \alpha + \beta^{\prime} + A (n-1) \beta +
\omega^{\prime} + \left[C + \frac{1}{2} (3 A + C) (n-1)\right] \omega = 0 \nonumber \\ \nonumber \\
&&\qquad \frac{1}{2} (A - C) \gamma + \kappa^{\prime} + \frac{1}{2} (3 A + C) (n-1) \kappa + \varepsilon^{\prime} + A (n-1) \varepsilon + C \theta = 0 \nonumber \\ \nonumber \\
&&\!\!\!\!- \gamma^{\prime} + \left[A - (A + C) \left(n-\frac{1}{2}\right)\right] \gamma + \delta^{\prime} + A (n-1)
\delta + \theta^{\prime} + \left[C + \frac{1}{2}(A + C) (n-1)\right] \theta = 0 \nonumber \\ \nonumber \\
&&\qquad - \frac{1}{2} (A + C) \alpha + \pi^{\prime} + \frac{1}{2} (A + C) (n-1) \pi + \tau^{\prime} + A (n-1) \tau + C \omega = 0 \label{Cd4}
\

\begin{eqnarray} \label{FE}
&&\left\{\left[(n-2)^2 + 4 m^2 R^2\right] z^4 +(6n - 2n^2 -4 -8 m^2 R^2) z^3
+(n^2-2n+4m^2R^2)z^2\right\} \frac{d^2}{dz^2} \pi + \nonumber \\
&&\left\{\left[(n-2)^2 + 4m^2R^2\right]n z^3 + \left[-6m^2R^2n+4(n-1)^2
-\frac{3}{2}n^3\right]z^2 \right. + \nonumber \\
&&\left.\left(\frac{n^2}{2}-n +2m^2R^2\right)nz\right\} \frac{d}{dz} \pi + \nonumber \\
&&\left\{ \left(5m^2+\frac{n^4}{4}+4m^4-6m^2n+1+\frac{13}{4}n^2-3n
-\frac{3}{2}n^3+2n^2m^2R^2\right) z^2 \right. + \nonumber \\
&&\left(-4m^4-6m^2+\frac{11}{2}n
+5m^2n-3+\frac{5}{4}n^3-\frac{1}{4}n^4-\frac{7}{2}n^2-2n^2m^2R^2\right) z  \nonumber \\
&&\left. -m^2R^2(n-1)+\frac{n}{4}\left(3n-n^2-2\right)\right\} \pi = 0
\

\begin{eqnarray}
X^0 &=& \sinh t - \frac{1}{2} e^{- t} x_i x^i \, , \nonumber \\
X^i &=& e^{- t} x^i, \qquad i = 1,...,n-1 \, , \nonumber \\
X^n &=& \cosh t - \frac{1}{2} e^{- t} x_i x^i \, ,
\
